questions.question_text:
You need to configure a phone call activity for the dean.
To which value should you set the value of the Call With field?

discussion.content: Awful question since the lookup fields on Phone Call are named 'Call From' and 'Call To'....'Call With' doesn't exist. Since they probably mean 'Call To', C seems the correct answer.

comments.content:
The Call With field is automatically populated with the customer name you select in the account or contact field. You can select a different contact, account, lead, or user record if required.
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customerengagement/on-premises/basics/add-phone-call-task-email-appointment-activity-case-record
It seems C is correct

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Dean would like to thanks for the CEO, C is probably correct.

Selected Answer: C
yajusaclan explanation and link are correct
Given the Dean is calling the CEO, would that not be a Stakeholder?
Since the activity is to be configured for DEAN, i guess the answer should be DEAN

choices.A: Configure an end date for the price list.
choices.B: Set the Invoice Product to Use Default.
choices.C: Set the Invoice Product to Override Price.

discussion.content:
Correct
"Product prices on the invoice can be changed at the salespersonג€™s discretion"

Given answer is correct because of this:
- Product prices on the invoice can be changed at the salesperson's discretion
- The sales manager has received emails from ""a potential private box customer"" named Contoso, Ltd. confirming that they have not had any contact from any sales representative even though they are ready to purchase group tickets.
Also going with B...no supporting info to choose C

comments.content: As per the scenario: product prices on the invoice can be changed at the salesperson's discretion. C is correct

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
I will go for B too, seems there is no reason to override the price

comments.content: All I see is "they are ready to purchase group tickets", why would this need to be override?
Contoso Ltd want to buy Private box seats. As contoso is existing customer, Opportunity is entered opportunities and then converted to order to invoice, which will use default pricing.

discussion.content: I guess, but I don't see why it has to be C. There is no additional information on on what exactly Contoso wants to buy. Seems like B could be correct.

questions.question_text:
You need to configure pricing for the Contoso, Ltd. invoice.
What should you do?

DRAG DROP -
You need to create invoices for all customers.
Which products should you use? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Answer A is correct. Company B is just asking for the price.

choices.C: Create an order from each quote per country.

questions.question_text:
You need to process CompanyB's order.
What should you do?

comments.content: I am not sure if they have then them as an account...who knows how they manage suppliers.

discussion.content: What bothers me is that VendorZ is already associated with Contoso, so I would think there would already be an account record.
This is correct as this is an odd relationship that should be managed via connections.

questions.question_text:
You need to enter information about VendorZ into the system.
Which two actions should you perform? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.D: Update the contact preference for CompanyD.
choices.E: Create a sub-contact record for the vendor for CompanyD.
choices.A: Update the contact preference for VendorZ.
choices.C: Create an account record for VendorZ.
